title: Brás Cubas
description: A satirical novel in which the deceased narrator Brás Cubas recounts his life and philosophical musings.

title: Brave New World
description: A dystopian novel envisioning a technologically advanced future society driven by conditioning and consumerism.

title: David Copperfield
description: A bildungsroman following the life and adventures of David Copperfield from childhood to maturity.

title: Livro do Desassossego
description: A fragmentary work blending prose and poetry reflecting the inner thoughts and existential disquiet of its narrator.

title: Sample
description: A sample text file for testing and demonstration purposes.

title: The Portrait of a Lady
description: A novel exploring the experiences and moral challenges of Isabel Archer as she navigates society and personal freedom.
